p: Overall, the enteroviral etiology and epidemiologic characteristics involved in aseptic meningitis in Brazil is similar to that observed around the world. E-30 and E-6 are predominant serotypes involved in aseptic meningitis cases. The Brazilian vast territory associated with recurrent E-6/E-30 detection throughout the years, and the high recombination capacity of these viruses showed the importance of enterovirus surveillance in the aseptic meningitis context.
